free_text.Learning outcomes: Introduction to fundamentals of bacteriology and virology. Emphasis will be on microbial diversity and aspects of microbial physiology that are unique to microbes.
free_text.Content: 1. Microbial diversity[br/]2. Microbial cell structure[br/]3. Microbial transmembrane transport[br/]4. Microbial motility and chemotaxis[br/]5. Microbial differentiation[br/]6. Microbial metabolic diversity[br/]7. Microbial ecology[br/]8. Microbial symbiosis[br/]9. Microbial phenotypic heterogeneity[br/]10. Putting microbes to work[br/]11. Principles of microbial pathogenesis[br/]12. Virology - molecular aspects[br/]13. Virology - pathogenesis[br/]14. Virology - retroelements
